Tasks.Task Description: Identify the goals and requirements for the IoT Edge deployment, including device types, data processing needs, and integration with cloud services.
Choose hardware devices that meet the requirements for running IoT Edge modules, considering factors like processing power, connectivity, and environmental conditions.
Set up an Azure IoT Hub to manage IoT Edge devices and enable communication between devices and the cloud.
Register IoT Edge devices in the Azure IoT Hub and generate device connection strings for secure communication.
Install the IoT Edge runtime on the selected devices to enable them to run IoT Edge modules.

Tasks.Task: Develop and Deploy IoT Edge Modules
Tasks.Task Description: Create custom IoT Edge modules or use pre-built modules to process data locally on devices. Deploy these modules to IoT Edge devices via IoT Hub.
Implement security measures such as device authentication, module encryption, and secure communication protocols to protect data and devices.
Configure monitoring tools to track device health, module performance, and connectivity status. Set up alerts for critical issues.
Perform end-to-end testing of the IoT Edge setup, including device connectivity, module functionality, and data processing workflows.
Create detailed documentation of the IoT Edge setup, including device configurations, module deployments, and operational procedures.
Provide training to the operations team on managing IoT Edge devices, troubleshooting issues, and deploying new modules.
Ensure the IoT Edge deployment adheres to regulatory compliance requirements and establish regular auditing procedures.
